Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Drive more traffic • Get more leads • Grow your business.

Search engine optimization (SEO) designed to massively increase your traffic and quickly generate leads and sales

(Source: Advanced Web Ranking)

The first 5 search result positions get approximately 75% of all clicks.

Make sure you're not invisible

Google has gotten so good at delivering the results we expect, that our behavior has changed. If we don’t see the results we want on the first page, we’re more likely to change our search than to click through to the next page of results.

But why does that matter?

It matters because your business may as well be invisible if it isn’t listing on page one of search engine results. And today almost every thought or idea we have begins with a search of some kind. This makes it super important that your business be there in those moments...when decisions are made and opinions formed.

With search engine optimization, you can help make sure your business is ready and available when customers are looking for the help you can give them.

"75% of users never scroll past the first page of search results"

— (Google)

How we'll improve your search rankings

Technical Accuracy

We make it easy for search engines to find and rank your content. We'll use on-page SEO best practices and our user experience knowledge to get your site ranking high on search results pages. We'll make sure your site is blazing fast, your site structure and content is optimized, your design and layout is responsive, images optimized and much more using our on-page SEO checklist.

Relevant Content

We help create content your customers and search engines love. We do this by understanding your business, your markets and niches. We get to know your customers and industry influencers and we help create content that drives awareness, moves visitors through consideration, and turns them into customers and sales ready opportunities.

Trust & Authority

Link building is often sites as the most difficult aspect of search optimization, but its also one way Google determines how trustworthy and authoritative your business is on a particular subject. We can help you with your link building and outreach. We'll create content that is relevant and meaningful to your industries influencers, content that their audiences are highly interested in and content that makes it impossible for them to pass on.

We help turn your business into the go-to authority for your area of expertise from making people aware of your business, through consideration and purchase.

Sound Good? Lets Talk

Why Consider Search Engine Optimization

  • You’re looking to improve your search traffic
  • Your competition is showing increased activity
  • Break into new markets
  • Attract and retain new customers

Why Consider FreshJones for Your Search Optimization?

Here are a number of reasons to consider FreshJones for your search engine optimization efforts, but the most important reason? We're nice people, we'll work hard to get the results you're looking for and we'll make the process fun and enjoyable .

Strategy

Everything we do begins with a strategic mindset. We're firm believers in data-driven decision making and will always bring good ideas and suggested and recommended solutions to the table for consideration.

Certified Technicians

Our SEO technicians have gone through multiple SEO certification courses, including ClickMinded SEO certification and SEO that Works Courses.

Result-Driven

We develop a data-driven, goal-oriented mindset for all of our programs and projects and we help you analyze your data and performance indicators and use that data to make informed decisions about how we can improve and optimize our efforts incrementally and consistently improving and optimizing to get the best returns possible.

100% White hat

Our SEO strategies and tactics are 100% white hat, we don't ever use any hacks or black magic to try and trick search engines into higher rankings. We believe the best way to get high ranking search results is data-driven decision making, long-term relationships and deliberate and consistent effort.

100% Transparency

We believe at its most basic level business is all about one person help solve another persons problems. We'll work together with you as partners, we'll look at and make decisions based on data together. We'll help answer questions and educate along the way. We're always honest, upfront and completely transparent about our approach and our results.

Content

As SEO and user experience experts we can help you develop a content strategy that will provide your users with a relevant engaging web experience and one that search engines will love.

Our Content Marketing Process

  • 1

    Discovery & Strategy

    No two companies are alike, so we'll get to know you, your business and the challenges and problems you face. We'll understand your business goals, your markets and industry influencers. We'll learn about your capabilities, your products and service offerings. We'll do extensive research on where your business currently is regarding content and search rankings and we'll benchmark and put together our findings, recommendations, and suggested approach.

  • 2

    On-page Optimization

    We'll use our technical expertise and best-practice industry standard techniques to optimize your websites pages for a great user experience. We'll make sure your site is blazing fast, your site structure and content is optimized, your design and layout is responsive, images optimized and much more using our on-page SEO checklist.

  • 3

    Document Relevancy

    We'll first look at your target audiences and the influencers in your industry. We'll understand whats important to these people, what they're interested in. We'll use keyword analysis and research to help you set up relevant content that help solve your users problems and that guide them through each of the different stages of their purchasing journey from just knowing about your business, considering you as an option to finally wanting to make a purchase.

  • 4

    Link Building and Outreach

    We don't subscribe to the "Publish and Pray" approach to content marketing. We'll use battle-tested content promotion strategies to help you build relationships with the influencers in your industry and get them to share your links. We'll help you identify the influencers in your industry, how to build trust with them, and how to do outreach that gets them to share your links.

  • 5

    Monitor, Test and Improve

    Throughout our engagement we'll work together to review, analyze test and improve our efforts. Making sure you're getting the most out of your investment and that your goals are being accomplished.

Favorite SEO Tools

Why let us help with your search engine optimization

1

You need a plan to increase your rankings

2

You want help with with keywords research

3

You want to stay ahead of SEO tactics and techniques

4

You need a system to follow and want to track your success and incrementally improve your results

Most importantly, you have a business to run!

What you'll get with a search optimized website

You'll get a plan that addresses your growth strategy so you can feel confident and secure knowing you'll use this plan to monitor, measure and optimize your efforts and that your yielding the return on your investment you expect.

You'll get a site that consistently ranks higher in search engines making sure your business is there whenever someone is looking for your expertise.

You'll get a site that optimized to provide a great experience for your users, when you give your users what they need, when they need it and in a fast an easy manner they'll remember your business and reward that effort when it comes time to make a purchase or a recommendation.

You'll get a site that helps your enhances your existing marketing efforts, a high-quality site saves you money on paid search campaigns, gets more clicks and creates a virtuous cycle of value for your business.

You'll get a site that addresses your audiences needs across their complete buyers journey, from awareness, through consideration and ultimately purchasing, repeat purchasing and promoting.

Sound good? Lets talk SEO

Let's get to know each other.

We'll ask you some questions and listen to your specific challenges. We'll find out what you've tried so far, what's worked for you in the past and what hasn't. Lastly we'll let you know how we might be able to help and see if you'd like to take a next step.

Would that be worth a 1/2 hour of your time?
